title: user service authentication and rbac validation
description: Test the User Service API endpoints to verify authentication via Clerk, JWT token issuance, and role-based access control enforcement across all microservices.

title: advising service course scheduling and conflict detection
description: Validate the Advising Service API for generating optimal course schedules using the constraint satisfaction solver and detecting scheduling conflicts considering athletic commitments.

title: compliance service ncaa eligibility rules enforcement
description: Verify the Compliance Service API correctly implements NCAA Division I initial and continuing eligibility rules, including audit logging and automated compliance reporting.

title: monitoring service academic performance tracking and alerts
description: Test the Monitoring Service API for aggregating academic performance data, generating progress reports, and pushing real-time alerts via WebSocket for at-risk students.

title: support service tutoring session booking and notifications
description: Validate the Support Service API endpoints for booking tutoring sessions, tracking study hall attendance, and sending real-time notifications to users.

title: integration service external system coordination
description: Test the Integration Service API for managing travel letters, faculty liaison communications, and integrations with external systems such as LMS, SIS, and email.

title: ai service conversational ai streaming and rag pipelines
description: Verify the AI Service API delivers streaming conversational responses with low latency, supports retrieval-augmented generation pipelines over NCAA rules and institutional knowledge, and handles autonomous agentic workflows.

title: environment variable validation and error handling
description: Test centralized environment variable validation using Zod schemas to ensure missing or invalid configurations are caught at startup with clear error messages.

title: middleware authentication authorization and rate limiting
description: Validate middleware functionality across all services including authentication, authorization, role-based rate limiting, correlation ID tracing, error handling, and structured logging.

title: security features encryption and pii handling
description: Test security features including encryption at rest and in transit, prompt injection prevention, PII filtering, FERPA-aligned audit logs, and human-in-the-loop AI workflows.
